abstract.t: This document describes a method to incrementally increase the security of wireless networks against passive attackers / pervasive monitors through unauthenticated encryption. [ Ed note: Text inside square brackets ([]) is additional background information, answers to frequently asked questions, general musings, etc. They will be removed before publication.] [ This document is being collaborated on in Github at: https://github.com/wkumari/draft-wkumari-owe.
